ms_copies_parts.notes: Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II

later_editions.opus_designation: Op. 26, no. 1 of Sei quartetti per due violini, alto e basso
later_editions.title: composti del Signor Luigi Boccherini di Lucca virtuoso di camera e compositor di S. A. R. Don Luigi Infante di Spagna
later_editions.notes: Some copies have the name and address of Imbault pasted over the name and address of another publisher (Le Duc). The edition was perhaps produced by Le Duc and then immediately taken over by Imbault.

entries.notes: Op. 22 no. 2 of 1775 ('quartettino ... opera piccola') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue.
